msg: 今天就是獎助金公開提案最後一天嘍！
有興趣參與的朋友記得把握時間，寫不完也至少今天要上傳提案，已經上傳的提案可以修改至 1/15，但是今天一定要上傳喔！
slackbot11's url: [g0v.tw 台灣零時政府 - #線上公開提案最後一天 #快來tag你還在逃避的朋友 　 今晚 23:59... | Facebook]

Hey g0vers! I recently made this web page https://speakup.tw/en/idg-xi based on the many translations (translated by g0vers and other professionals) of this incredibly beautiful declaration issued by representatives of Taiwan’s indigenous peoples. I’m wondering if anyone’s interested to contribute more languages to it? I think it will be great :slightly_smiling_face:
